issue.title: SHOP allows to order without accepting terms and conditions
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

SHOP allows to order without accepting terms and conditions.
* Button is not disabled
* Products transmission starts and order is saved

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Villemagne Jérôme

The button's ids were modified in the view but not in the JS
